body: Despite what {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} family would say, m_c was not the wonderful parent that r_c wanted {PRONOUN/m_c/object} to be, and {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} {VERB/r_c/do/does}n't shed a single tear at m_c's vigil.
